For <S%G1063><s%> indeed <S%G2532><s%> we have had <S%G2070><s%> good news preached <S%G2097><s%> to us, <S%G2509><s%> even as they <S%G2548><s%> also did, <S%G235><s%> but the word <S%G3056><s%> they heard <S%G189><s%> <S%G5623><s%> didn't <S%G3756><s%> profit <S%G5623><s%> them, <S%G1565><s%> because it wasn't <S%G3361><s%> mixed <S%G4786><s%> with faith <S%G4102><s%> by those who heard. <S%G191><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> we <S%G1525><s%> who have believed <S%G4100><s%> do enter <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> that rest, <S%G2663><s%> even as <S%G2531><s%> he has said, <S%G2046><s%> "As <S%G5613><s%> I swore <S%G3660><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> wrath, <S%G3709><s%> <S%G1487><s%> they will not enter <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> rest; <S%G2663><s%>" although <S%G2543><s%> the works <S%G2041><s%> were finished <S%G1096><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the foundation <S%G2602><s%> of the world. <S%G2889><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> he has said <S%G2046><s%> this somewhere <S%G4225><s%> about <S%G3779><s%> the <S%G4012><s%> seventh <S%G1442><s%> day, <S%G2532><s%> "God <S%G2316><s%> rested <S%G2664><s%> on <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G2250><s%> seventh <S%G1442><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> from <S%G575><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> his <S%G846><s%> works; <S%G2041><s%>"
and <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> this <S%G5129><s%> place again, <S%G3825><s%> <S%G1487><s%> "They will not enter <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> rest. <S%G2663><s%>"

Seeing <S%G1893><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> it remains <S%G620><s%> that some <S%G5100><s%> should enter <S%G1525><s%> therein, <S%G846><s%> <S%G1519><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they to whom the good news was <S%G2097><s%> before <S%G4386><s%> preached <S%G2097><s%> failed <S%G3756><s%> to enter <S%G1525><s%> in <S%G1525><s%> because of <S%G1223><s%> disobedience, <S%G543><s%>

he again <S%G3825><s%> defines <S%G3724><s%> a certain <S%G5100><s%> day, <S%G2250><s%> today, <S%G4594><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%> through <S%G1722><s%> David <S%G1138><s%> so long <S%G5118><s%> a time <S%G5550><s%> afterward <S%G3326><s%> (just as <S%G2531><s%> has been said <S%G2046><s%>), "Today <S%G4594><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> you will hear <S%G191><s%> his <S%G846><s%> voice, <S%G5456><s%> don't <S%G3361><s%> harden <S%G4645><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> hearts. <S%G2588><s%>"

For <S%G1063><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> Joshua <S%G2424><s%> had given <S%G2664><s%> them <S%G846><s%> rest, <S%G2664><s%> <S%G302><s%> he <S%G2980><s%> would not <S%G3756><s%> have spoken <S%G2980><s%> <S%G99999><s%> afterward <S%G3326><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> another <S%G243><s%> day. <S%G2250><s%>
There remains <S%G620><s%> therefore <S%G686><s%> a Sabbath rest <S%G4520><s%> for the people <S%G2992><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> he <S%G846><s%> who has entered <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> his <S%G846><s%> rest <S%G2663><s%> has himself <S%G846><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> rested <S%G2664><s%> from <S%G575><s%> his works, <S%G2041><s%> as <S%G5618><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> did from <S%G575><s%> his. <S%G846><s%>

Let us therefore <S%G3767><s%> give diligence <S%G4704><s%> to enter <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> that <S%G1565><s%> rest, <S%G2443><s%> lest <S%G3361><s%> anyone <S%G5100><s%> fall <S%G4098><s%> after <S%G1722><s%> the same <S%G846><s%> example <S%G5262><s%> of disobedience. <S%G543><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> is living, <S%G2198><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> active, <S%G1756><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> sharper <S%G5114><s%> than <S%G5228><s%> any <S%G3956><s%> two-edged <S%G1366><s%> sword, <S%G3162><s%> and piercing <S%G1338><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> to <S%G891><s%> the dividing <S%G3311><s%> of <S%G5037><s%> soul <S%G5590><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> spirit, <S%G4151><s%> of both <S%G5037><s%> joints <S%G719><s%> and <S%G5037><s%> marrow, <S%G3452><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> is able to discern <S%G2924><s%> the thoughts <S%G1761><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> intentions <S%G1771><s%> of the heart. <S%G2588><s%>

There <S%G2076><s%> is no <S%G3756><s%> creature <S%G2937><s%> that is hidden <S%G852><s%> from <S%G1799><s%> his <S%G846><s%> sight, <S%G1799><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> are naked <S%G1131><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> laid open <S%G5136><s%> before the eyes <S%G3788><s%> of him <S%G846><s%> with <S%G4314><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> we have <S%G2254><s%> to do. <S%G3056><s%>

Having <S%G2192><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> a great <S%G3173><s%> high priest, <S%G749><s%> who has passed through <S%G1330><s%> the heavens, <S%G3772><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> let us hold tightly <S%G2902><s%> to our confession. <S%G3671><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> we don't <S%G3756><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> a high priest <S%G749><s%> who <S%G1410><s%> can't <S%G3361><s%> be touched with the feeling <S%G4834><s%> of our <S%G2257><s%> infirmities, <S%G769><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> one who has been <S%G3985><s%> in <S%G2596><s%> all points <S%G3956><s%> tempted <S%G3985><s%> <S%G3987><s%> like <S%G2596><s%> we <S%G3665><s%> are, <S%G5565><s%> yet without sin. <S%G266><s%>

Let us <S%G4334><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> draw <S%G4334><s%> near <S%G3326><s%> with boldness <S%G3954><s%> to the throne <S%G2362><s%> of grace, <S%G5485><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> we may receive <S%G2983><s%> mercy, <S%G1656><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> may find <S%G2147><s%> grace <S%G5485><s%> for help <S%G996><s%> in time of <S%G1519><s%> need. <S%G2121><s%>
